languages.text: Вскоре после этого в Просторе Коронус появилась новая банда наемников — пестрая армия людей и ксеносов, возглавляемая жестоким и кровожадным лидером-друкари.
Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.
languages.original_text: Вскоре после этого в Просторе Коронус появилась новая банда наемников — пестрая армия людей и ксеносов, возглавляемая жестоким и кровожадным лидером-друкари.

traits.locale_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw a new mercenary company — a colourful army of humans and xenos, led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless drukhari leader.
Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw a new mercenary company — a colourful army of humans and xenos, led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless drukhari leader.
Soon after, the Expanse saw a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.
Soon after, the Expanse saw a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.
Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.
Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

languages.text: 不久之后，科罗努斯扩区出现了一支新的雇佣军。这支军队由人类和异形混编而成，他们的领袖是一位嗜血无情的黑暗灵族。
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: 不久之后，科罗努斯扩区出现了一支新的雇佣军。这支军队由人类和异形混编而成，他们的领袖是一位嗜血无情的黑暗灵族。

languages.text: Bald darauf tauchte in der Koronus-Ausdehnung eine neue Söldnergruppe auf — ein bunter Haufen von Menschen und Xenos, angeführt von einem blutrünstigen und gnadenlosen Drukhari.
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: Bald darauf tauchte in der Ausdehnung eine neue Söldnergruppe auf — ein bunter Haufen von Menschen und Xenos, angeführt von einem blutrünstigen und gnadenlosen Drukhari.

languages.text: Peu après, un nouveau groupe de mercenaires apparut dans les Étendues de Koronus : une armée hétéroclite d'humains et de xénos dirigée par un impitoyable chef drukhari assoiffé de sang.
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: Peu après, un nouveau groupe de mercenaires apparut dans les Étendues : une armée hétéroclite d'humains et de xénos dirigée par un impitoyable chef drukhari assoiffé de sang.

languages.text: Poco después, la Extensión de Koronus fue testigo del nacimiento de un nuevo grupo mercenario: un ejército variopinto de humanos y xenos liderados por un Drukhari brutal y sanguinario.
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: Poco después, la Extensión conoció a un nuevo grupo mercenario: un ejército variopinto de humanos y xenos liderados por un Drukhari brutal y sanguinario.

languages.text: 程なくして、コロヌス・エクスパンスは新たな傭兵団の登場を目にした。血に飢えた冷酷なデュカーリがリーダーとして率いる、人間と異種族の混成軍隊である。
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: 程なくして、コロヌス・エクスパンスは新たな傭兵団の登場を目にした。血に飢えた冷酷なデュカーリがリーダーとして率いる、人間と異種族の混成軍隊である。

languages.text: Kısa süre sonra Koronus Enginliği'nde yeni bir paralı asker grubu; kana susamış ve acımasız bir Drukhari'nin liderlik ettiği, insan ve zenolardan oluşan karma bir ordu ortaya çıktı.
languages.original_text: Soon after, the Koronus Expanse saw the rise of a new mercenary group — a motley army of humans and xenos led by a bloodthirsty and ruthless Drukhari leader.

traits.locale_text: Kısa süre sonra Koronus Enginliği'nde yeni bir paralı asker grubu ortaya çıktı: Kana susamış ve acımasız bir Drukhari'nin liderlik ettiği, insan ve zenolardan oluşan karma bir ordu.
